jobDescription: EBSCO Information Services (EIS) provides a complete and optimized research solution comprised of e-journals, e-books, and research databases — all combined with the most powerful discovery service to support the information needs and maximize the research experience of our end-users. Headquartered in Ipswich, MA, EIS employs more than 3,300 people worldwide. We are the leader in our field due to our cutting-edge technology, forward-thinking philosophy, and top-notch workforce. EIS, a division of EBSCO Industries Inc., based in Birmingham, AL, is ranked in the top 200 of the nation’s largest, privately held corporations according to Forbes magazine. EBSCO is a company that will motivate you, inspire you, and allow you to grow. We are looking for the best. If you are too, we encourage you to explore our unique opportunities. Mission: EBSCO’s Content Management (CM) team is looking for a creative and motivated individual who, like us, have a passion for data, innovation, problem-solving, and continuous improvement. The ideal candidate will be a passionate problem-solver with excellent analytical skills, who is comfortable navigating large data sets from multiple sources, clearly connects technology solutions with measurable business value, and is eager to work fast and smart as part of a high-performing team. The Senior Data Analyst will constantly seek ways to improve and automate day-to-day operations for the team, enabling us to exceed customer needs and expectations by delivering content quicker and with higher quality. The position is a great fit for a motivated self-starter who loves to drive sustainable solutions for real business problems.
